TEXT.S: siwkay ni Charles Barkley ci Charles Barkley nalecuh i Leeds, Alabama, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Charles Barkley i 1984 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 5, namapili' tu nu Philadelphia 76ers putiput. ci Charles Barkley nalecuhan i 2 a bulad 20 a demiad, 1963 a mihca. ci Charles Barkley, miunduay.
